text: nivu ellinda horataru (namajh‌na vele) nim'ma mukhavannu ‘masjidul haram’nedege tirugisikolliri mattu nivu (visvasigalu) elle iddaru, nim'ma mukhavannu a dikkige tirugisikolliri. Janara paiki akramigala horatu berara baliyu nim'ma virud'dha yavude vada uliyabaradendu (i adesa nidalagide). Nim'ma palige nanu nanna anugrahagalannu purtigolisuvantagalu mattu nivu sanmarga padedavaragalu – nivu avarige anjabedi, nanage anjiri
